$interpreted: Haunted House Boss: ...Are you aware of just who it was you scared half to death a moment ago?
Haunted House Boss: That's the grandchild of one of the Seahorse Chieftan's buddies!
Haunted House Boss: Surprise, surprise, a Westerner like you can't even control yourself!! What am I gonna do if they've been scared stupid!?
???: Heheh...
Haunted House Boss: And you're still giggling about it! Don't you know anything!?
Haunted House Boss: Oh heck, I've made it this far without giving up... You're not to harm the master of the forbidden book—That's me!
Haunted House Boss: This tome here's 100% genuine~ So don't waste your breath...
Haunted House Boss: You... you wouldn't dare...
Haunted House Boss: "Shackles Arise!"
???: Gyaaaaghh!
Haunted House Boss: You're more stubborn than a stinkbug!! Ain't that right~ Shirley!?
Shirley: Yaaaaagh────────
Tindoiimu: (So... she's got a tome for controlling the spirits...)
Miranda: Sh-sh-she's exploiting the spirits for p-p-profit!
Joan: She sure is~ I could use a little spiritual guidance to help me out myself... but I'd never bully them like that!!!
Joan: Anyway~ You're trembling real hard back there...
Miranda: (Wah! Who was that!?)
Joan: (Shh, quiet down~~)
Tindoiimu: You two...
Haunted House Boss: I'll let you go for now, but you'll only have yourself to blame if I catch you getting up to any funny business!!
Joan: (Gah! My mark's getting away from me!)
Miranda: You...
Joan: ....Huh? Me?
Tindoiimu: Eh...
Tindoiimu: (Maybe now's not the time to ask about the lost and found...)
Shirley: It's so lively tonight...
Shirley: The place was all lit up in flames, and I thought for a moment I was free at last...
Shirley: Before I realized I was stuck here all along, just like this thingy...
Tindoiimu: Ah! The Charm...!
Tindoiimu: I've been searching for so long... Thank you...
Miranda: Hey! Is that what you've been looking for!? I'd never thought it'd be picked up by a ghost...
Tindoiimu: The boss called you Shirley just now... Is she controlling you using your name?
Shirley: I don't know... Somebody... used this name to summon me... After I awoke, I found I couldn't leave this place...
Shirley: I'm trying to get my memories back, and to reach that child of mine...
Tindoiimu: ………
Miranda: But how...
Joan: ...Waaah, this is too sad...
Miranda: ………
Miranda: I won't pretend I'm not afraid of you.
Miranda: ...But I still want to help you.
Miranda: After all, I can't just stand back and watch after what we just saw!
Joan: (Hmm~ With a few more teammates on my side, getting a hold of that book should be smooth sailing~~)
Joan: Yeah! Me too!
Tindoiimu: (I don't need even more trouble on my plate...)
Tindoiimu: (But I couldn't just do nothing, even if I didn't have the Charm back already...)
Tindoiimu: (...That poor, enslaved spirit...)
Tindoiimu: ……………
Tindoiimu: ………
Shirley: ......
Shirley: Th-thank you...
Shirley: Thank you...
Joan: We're gonna steal that book and set Shirley free★ Let's do it!

Model.Text: ...Are you aware of just who it was you scared half to death a moment ago?
That's the grandchild of one of the Seahorse Chieftan's buddies!
Surprise, surprise, a Westerner like you can't even control yourself!! What am I gonna do if they've been scared stupid!?
Heheh...
And you're still giggling about it! Don't you know anything!?
Oh heck, I've made it this far without giving up... You're not to harm the master of the forbidden book—That's me!
This tome here's 100% genuine~ So don't waste your breath...
You... you wouldn't dare...
"Shackles Arise!"
Gyaaaaghh!
You're more stubborn than a stinkbug!! Ain't that right~ Shirley!?
Yaaaaagh────────
(So... she's got a tome for controlling the spirits...)
Sh-sh-she's exploiting the spirits for p-p-profit!
She sure is~ I could use a little spiritual guidance to help me out myself... but I'd never bully them like that!!!
Anyway~ You're trembling real hard back there...
(Wah! Who was that!?)
(Shh, quiet down~~)
You two...
I'll let you go for now, but you'll only have yourself to blame if I catch you getting up to any funny business!!
(Gah! My mark's getting away from me!)
You...
....Huh? Me?
Eh...
(Maybe now's not the time to ask about the lost and found...)
It's so lively tonight...
The place was all lit up in flames, and I thought for a moment I was free at last...
Before I realized I was stuck here all along, just like this thingy...
Ah! The Charm...!
I've been searching for so long... Thank you...
Hey! Is that what you've been looking for!? I'd never thought it'd be picked up by a ghost...
The boss called you Shirley just now... Is she controlling you using your name?
I don't know... Somebody... used this name to summon me... After I awoke, I found I couldn't leave this place...
I'm trying to get my memories back, and to reach that child of mine...
But how...
...Waaah, this is too sad...
I won't pretend I'm not afraid of you.
...But I still want to help you.
After all, I can't just stand back and watch after what we just saw!
(Hmm~ With a few more teammates on my side, getting a hold of that book should be smooth sailing~~)
Yeah! Me too!
(I don't need even more trouble on my plate...)
(But I couldn't just do nothing, even if I didn't have the Charm back already...)
(...That poor, enslaved spirit...)
Th-thank you...
Thank you...
We're gonna steal that book and set Shirley free★ Let's do it!
